name: OracleofDelphi
0:
”Alexa consult the oracle”
”get an answer”
”ask the oracle”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: consult the oracle
des:
Ancient Greece was a world dominated by men in the highest positions in society. Men fought on the battlefield and ruled the mightiest empires. For centuries, however, all men from servants and soldiers to the emperor himself, sought the council and advice of one person – and that person was a woman. The Oracle of Delphi.

Consult The Oracle and she will share her secrets, her insights, or make predictions. Say "Alexa, consult the oracle."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
